description.text: Seeing your animal companion attacked or hurt causes you to retaliate with a bestial fury of your own.

sections.Benefit: When you activate Beastmaster Style's benefit, you gain a +2 morale bonus on melee weapon attack rolls and +4 morale bonus on weapon damage rolls against the attacking creature. If the enemy attack dealt damage to your animal companion, these bonuses increase to +4 and +8, respectively. These bonuses last until the end of your next turn.
